[[Image:FIUUMHBrawl.PNG|250px|thumb|right|Timeline of the infamous 2006 [[University of Miami]]-[[Florida International University|FIU]] brawl (left to right first row, followed by left to right second row): The extra point attempt before the brawl ensued; the brawl originating immediately after the extra point attempt; the brawl near its peak; the referee declaring ejections and 15-yard penalty on kickoff]]
 
{{Main|Miami-FIU brawl}}
{{Main|Miami-FIU brawl}}
On October 14, 2006, in the first meeting of cross-town programs, Miami and the [[Florida International Golden Panthers football|Florida International Golden Panthers]] brawled after a [[Extra point|PAT]].
